name: part_001
file: tmp_【#兎田ぺこら３周年 ⧸ 3DLIVE】Chu! Summer Party♪【ホロライブ】 [Di8D8BvZZp0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Usada Pekora performs 'Hatsukoi Cider' on a tropical-themed 3D stage with floating hearts.
Usada Pekora performs her original song 'Iiwake Bunny' with vibrant, colorful visuals and bubble effects.
Pekora catches her breath and addresses the audience during an MC segment.

subtitles.original: いいでしょ 聞こえちゃう tonight
subtitles.english: Is it okay? You'll hear it tonight

subtitles.original: 早くなるドキドキ
subtitles.english: My heart starts beating faster

subtitles.original: 初恋はサイダーみたいに
subtitles.english: First love is like cider

subtitles.original: 弾ける
subtitles.english: Sparkling

subtitles.original: 友達同士 そんな境界線
subtitles.english: Just friends, that's the current line

subtitles.original: 今すぐに飛び越えたいの
subtitles.english: I want to jump over it right now

subtitles.original: キスをあげるよ
subtitles.english: I'll give you a kiss

subtitles.original: 今さら好きなんて
subtitles.english: Saying 'I love you' now

subtitles.original: 言葉より 効き目あるでしょ
subtitles.english: Is more effective than words, right?

subtitles.original: あなたにだけは そっと教えてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll tell only you, quietly

subtitles.original: 胸の奥 小さい 翼 の はばたく
subtitles.english: Deep in my heart, the sound of small wings

subtitles.original: 音を...
subtitles.english: flapping...

subtitles.original: 信じて
subtitles.english: Believe in it

subtitles.original: どっちが好きなのよ
subtitles.english: Which one do you like?

subtitles.original: いいわけバニー
subtitles.english: Excuse Bunny

subtitles.original: なんとかなんないかな？
subtitles.english: Can't we do something about this?

subtitles.original: ラビラビ 隣のあいつが邪魔だなぁ
subtitles.english: Labi-labi, that guy next to me is in the way

subtitles.original: よくないそんなこと ダメダメ
subtitles.english: That's not good, no-no

subtitles.original: selfish 絶対 永遠とは違うな
subtitles.english: selfish, absolutely, it's not eternity

subtitles.original: なんたって競争
subtitles.english: After all, competition

subtitles.original: 苦手だそういうの
subtitles.english: I'm bad at that kind of thing

subtitles.original: 何度も寂しい 気むずかし
subtitles.english: Many times lonely, being difficult

subtitles.original: 練習したっけ？ ペコパレット好きでしょ
subtitles.english: Did I practice? You like Peko Palette, right?

subtitles.original: あの子に負けない けどだってジェラシー
subtitles.english: I won't lose to that girl, but because of jealousy

subtitles.original: 欲張り目 横取りか してみます！ おー！
subtitles.english: Greedy eyes, taking it away? I'll try it! Oh!

subtitles.original: 言わなきゃって分かってる
subtitles.english: I know I have to say it

subtitles.original: あーでもない こーでもない 夢にしましょう
subtitles.english: Not this, not that, let's make it a dream

subtitles.original: つらぬけ my my my...
subtitles.english: Go through my my my...

subtitles.original: 聞きたくない いいわけバニー
subtitles.english: I don't want to hear it, Excuse Bunny

subtitles.original: 地団駄の優柔不断だんだん
subtitles.english: Stomping feet, indecisiveness gradually

subtitles.original: バニバニ ダリダリ 待ちぼうけの話
subtitles.english: Bunny-bunny, dally-dally, the story of being stood up

subtitles.original: どっち どっちが好きなのよ
subtitles.english: Which, which one do you like?

subtitles.original: ダメダメ ダメダメ
subtitles.english: No-no, no-no

subtitles.original: 逃げ出したいのは私の本音でしょ
subtitles.english: Wanting to run away is my true feeling

subtitles.original: 通しません 反対方向
subtitles.english: I won't let you through, opposite direction

subtitles.original: Wanted! いいわけバニー
subtitles.english: Wanted! Excuse Bunny

subtitles.original: 態度とか 言い回しとか
subtitles.english: Your attitude, your phrasing

subtitles.original: 興味がねーから ちょー苦手
subtitles.english: I'm not interested, I'm super bad at it

subtitles.original: 人込み 君探す はり込み
subtitles.english: Stakeout in the crowd to find you

subtitles.original: 届け強気味
subtitles.english: Deliver with high intensity

subtitles.original: 嫉妬だし 並ぶたび 微笑み
subtitles.english: It's jealousy, smiling every time we're together

subtitles.original: 散々エイチの トラストチャンス はい、もっと！
subtitles.english: Endless H's trust chance, yes, more!

subtitles.original: 前身あるのみ トラブルでエンドに
subtitles.english: Only moving forward, ending in trouble

subtitles.original: 閃動だ あんたたち やっちゃいましょ！
subtitles.english: It's a flash, everyone, let's do this!

subtitles.original: 疲れちゃった ひと休み
subtitles.english: I'm tired, let's take a break

subtitles.original: なんとかね やってよね 明日の私
subtitles.english: Somehow, handle it, tomorrow's me

subtitles.original: 任せろ my my my...
subtitles.english: Leave it to me my my my...

subtitles.original: 決められない いいわけバニー
subtitles.english: I can't decide, Excuse Bunny

subtitles.original: 有耶無耶演出は 功徳 争争争
subtitles.english: Vague production is merit, struggle struggle

subtitles.original: メニメニ モニモニ 待ちぼうけの話
subtitles.english: Many-many, moni-moni, the story of being kept waiting

subtitles.original: ほら ほら 私はもう
subtitles.english: Look, look, I'm already

subtitles.original: ダメダメ ダメダメ
subtitles.english: No-no, no-no

subtitles.original: 遊びじゃないです それなんて
subtitles.english: This is not a game, that is

subtitles.original: 恋ってない 私一途な本音でしょ
subtitles.english: Not love, it's my single-minded true feeling

subtitles.original: 参りません 逃がさない
subtitles.english: I won't give in, I won't let you escape

subtitles.original: どこへだって 行けばいい
subtitles.english: You can go anywhere you want

subtitles.original: 言い訳ない 容赦しない 冗談じゃない
subtitles.english: No excuses, no mercy, no joking around

subtitles.original: ぶつけろ my my my...
subtitles.english: Strike it my my my...

subtitles.original: 聞きたくない いいわけバニー
subtitles.english: I don't want to hear it, Excuse Bunny

subtitles.original: 地団駄の優柔不断だんだん
subtitles.english: Stomping feet, indecisiveness gradually

subtitles.original: バニバニ ダリダリ 待ちぼうけの話
subtitles.english: Bunny-bunny, dally-dally, the story of being stood up

subtitles.original: どっち どっちが好きなのよ
subtitles.english: Which, which one do you like?

subtitles.original: ダメダメ ダメダメ
subtitles.english: No-no, no-no

subtitles.original: 逃げ出したいけど 私しかないでしょ
subtitles.english: I want to run away, but it's only me, right?

subtitles.original: 通しません 反対方向
subtitles.english: I won't let you through, opposite direction

subtitles.original: Wanted! いいわけバニー
subtitles.english: Wanted! Excuse Bunny

subtitles.original: そんなんで いいわけバニー
subtitles.english: Like that, Excuse Bunny

subtitles.original: はい！ってなわけで
subtitles.english: Yes! And so

subtitles.original: 1曲目は初恋サイダー
subtitles.english: the first song was Hatsukoi Cider

subtitles.original: そして2曲目はいいわけバニー...
subtitles.english: and the second song was Iiwake Bunny...
